scripts.test:unitary: npx ts-mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=unitaryReport -p tsconfig.json tests/unitary/*.spec.ts --timeout 4000 --exit --test
scripts.test:functional: npx ts-mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=functionalReport -p tsconfig.json tests/functional/*.spec.ts --timeout 4000 --exit --test --serial
scripts.test:scenario: npx ts-mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=scenarioReport -p tsconfig.json tests/scenario/*.spec.ts --timeout 10000 --exit --test --serial
scripts.test:integration: npx ts-mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=integrationReport -p tsconfig.json tests/integration/*.spec.ts --timeout 10000 --exit --test --serial
scripts.test: pnpm test:unitary && pnpm test:functional && pnpm test:scenario && pnpm test:integration
